name: Uncovered (Selina Geboers)
description: Experience the beauty and mystery of an abandoned society in Uncovered, an environmental story game. Explore the remnants of a once-thriving culture and learn about its people through your interactions with the world. In the first level of this game, you'll have the chance to immerse yourself in a unique and captivating environment. Don't miss out on this opportunity to uncover the secrets of this lost civilization
